modName: Seraphim blade by Hentai - One-handed - redone
descriptionHtml:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18288

The original is from Hentai. The one-handed version is from furiousfighter. People in the comments section of the one-handed version had 2 complaints, one for it being too weak, and two for it being unfindable. So, what I did, was increase the damage, and the weapons can be found at the skyforge.

NOTE: I changed nothing, except for the damage and location.
author: DEMpancakes
